医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
垃圾焚烧厂对黑人和西班牙裔造成的伤害尤为严重当佛罗里达州人口最多的县的领导人九月开会，为可能成为全国最大的垃圾焚烧厂选择一个地点时，许多人前往政府中心抗议，因为过多的座位涌入了大楼的中庭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Trash-incinerators-disproportionately-harm-Black-and-Hispanic-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Trash-incinerators-disproportionately-harm-Black-and-Hispanic-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7b59de8-0d50-4820-a891-da14cf81985c Mon, 23 Dec 2024 10:15:28 -0500 Trash incinerators disproportionately harm Black and Hispanic people
“等待名单无处可去”：无家可归者调查将黑人困在街头莫里斯·克拉克（Maurice Clark）蜷缩在尘土飞扬的铁轨旁的帐篷里，两名无家可归者外展工作人员开始向他询问问题，以确定他是否有资格获得免费或补贴住房。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/e28098Waiting-list-to-nowheree28099-无家可归-surveys-trap-Black-men-on-the-streets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/e28098Waiting-list-to-nowheree28099-无家可归-surveys-trap-Black-men-on-the-streets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7afa2d8c-28d7-4ae2-9a82-661da11291d5 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 10:12:59 -0500 ‘Waiting list to nowhere’: Homelessness surveys trap Black men on the streets
社会工作者将无家可归者从拉斯维加斯隧道中劝出接受治疗最近一个秋天的下午，案件经理布莱恩·约翰逊（Bryon Johnson）将一盏灯照射到拉斯维加斯大道光鲜亮丽的黑暗隧道中。他走进一条水泥沟渠的开口，沟渠里到处都是垃圾和废弃的衣服，在地下世界中寻找他无家可归的客户。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Caseworkers-coax-homeless-people-out-of-Las-Vegase28099-tunnels-for-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Caseworkers-coax-homeless-people-out-of-Las-Vegase28099-tunnels-for-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81ce1bd3-54fb-4f19-837c-7f861945c095 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 08:26:25 -0500 Caseworkers coax homeless people out of Las Vegas’ tunnels for treatment
新的阿尔茨海默病指南提供了全面的诊断框架我们已经进入了一个针对阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 和 AD 相关神经退行性疾病 (ADRD) 的基于生物学的改进和新兴诊断生物标志物的新时代，这些生物标志物正在迅速影响每个临床环境中的评估和护理范式：初级护理、专科护理和痴呆症亚专科护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-Alzheimers-guidelines-provide-compressive-framework-for-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-Alzheimers-guidelines-provide-compressive-framework-for-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a96ed8e9-4168-4182-80f1-c5f3bea5bce0 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 08:24:35 -0500 New Alzheimer's guidelines provide comprehensive framework for diagnosis
研究揭示了 NAD 与衰老和疾病发展的联系布鲁塞尔大学研究人员的一项新发现告诉我们相关的神经退行性疾病是如何发展的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Study-unveils-NADs-link-to-aging-and-disease-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Study-unveils-NADs-link-to-aging-and-disease-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc8b69e5-3e95-4add-aa3a-b43b11c5b271 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 07:01:20 -0500 Study unveils NAD's link to aging and disease development
咖啡和茶的摄入与头颈癌风险降低有关最近对十几项研究的数据进行的分析表明，饮用咖啡和茶与降低患头颈癌（包括口腔癌和咽喉癌）的风险有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Coffee-and-tea-conspiration-linked-with-lower-risk-of-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Coffee-and-tea-conspiration-linked-with-lower-risk-of-head-and-neck-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e054e37e-8e3e-4cd3-a82d-4c4ff58a39f4 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 06:26:31 -0500 Coffee and tea consumption linked with lower risk of head and neck cancer
新型滴眼液治疗为干性 AMD 患者带来希望年龄相关性黄斑变性 (AMD) 是 65 岁以上人群视力丧失的主要原因，其特征是黄斑发生异常变化，导致视力下降和物体扭曲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-eye-drop-treatment-offers-hope-for-dry-AMD-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/New-eye-drop-treatment-offers-hope-for-dry-AMD-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39551deb-5edf-4d03-90f5-a4547f16f343 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 06:18:35 -0500 New eye drop treatment offers hope for dry AMD patients
突破性技术将癌细胞转化为正常细胞尽管发展了许多癌症治疗技术，但当前癌症治疗的共同目标是消除癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Groundwriting-technology-converts-cancer-cells-into-normal-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241223/Groundwriting-technology-converts-cancer-cells-into-normal-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99670b53-a403-433e-9733-426921ae2310 Mon, 23 Dec 2024 05:55:00 -0500 Groundbreaking technology converts cancer cells into normal cells
新公式预测红细胞的氧气输送能力科学家们开发出了一种通过测量红细胞形状来评估红细胞输送氧气的能力的方法。该测试可以改善专业移植和输血实践以及血库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/New-formula-predicts-oxygen-delivery-ability-of-red-blood-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/New-formula-predicts-oxygen-delivery-ability-of-red-blood-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1dbe59a-59a1-478c-8a0a-061669ebef05 Sun, 22 Dec 2024 23:45:00 -0500 New formula predicts oxygen delivery ability of red blood cells
右美沙芬被发现具有治疗肺纤维化的潜力许多止咳糖浆中常见的非处方成分可能对患有肺纤维化的人有更大的用途，肺纤维化与许多严重的健康状况有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/Dextromethorphan-found-to-have-pottial-in-treating-lung-太多纤维化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241222/Dextromethorphan-found-to-have-potial-in-treating-lung-太多纤维化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=add5f2c4-598f-4b09-9bcf-9f79b1c81c8f Sun, 22 Dec 2024 23:29:00 -0500 Dextromethorphan found to have potential in treating lung fibrosis
